alert.note: Alert for Greeley; Valley (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Hastings (North Central Kansas and South Central Nebraska)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 30 at 4:15AM CDT by NWS Hastings
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northern Greeley and northeastern Valley Counties through 445 AM CDT... At 415 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 8 miles south of Ericson, or 11 miles east of Ord, moving northeast at 50 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of northern Greeley and northeastern Valley Counties. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
